tn: "Le fa go ntse jalo," ga bua Jalo, O'Brien, o sa ntse a bua le bareetsi ba gagwe ba ba sa boneng, "le fa go le thata, le fa e le motho yo o se nang mathata. O ya lo se. Lo tla bo lo utlwile ka ga dilo tse di diregang mo dikhutlong tse di maswe tsa motse o. Mo mebileng, mosadi mongwe o ne a sa batle go tlogela ngwana wa gagwe a le esi mo ntlong, le fa e le metsotso e le metlhano. Rats o na le bonnete ba gore o tla mo tlhasela. Mo nakong e e sa feteng, di tla digela mo marapong. Gape ba tlhasela batho ba ba lwalang kgotsa ba a swa. 'Ba ne ba lemoga fa motho a se na thuso' - They showed a wonder of knowing when a human being helpless

en: Winstonâ€™s heart stirred. That was the bulletin from the front; instinct told him that it was bad news that was coming. All day, with little spurts of excitement, the thought of a smashing defeat in Africa had been in and out of his mind. He seemed actually to see the Eurasian army swarming across the never-broken frontier and pouring down into the tip of Africa like a column of ants. Why had it not been possible to outflank them in some way? The outline of the West African coast stood out vividly in his mind. He picked up the white knight and moved it across the board. There was the proper spot. Even while he saw the black horde racing southward he saw another force, mysteriously assembled, suddenly planted in their rear, cutting their communications by land and sea. He felt that by willing it he was bringing that other force into existence. But it was necessary to act quickly. If they could get control of the whole of Africa, if they had airfields and submarine bases at the Cape, it would cut Oceania in two. It might mean anything: defeat, breakdown, the redivision of the world, the destruction of the Party! He drew a deep breath. An extraordinary medley of feelingsâ€”but it was not a medley, exactly; rather it was successive layers of feeling, in which one could not say which layer was undermostâ€”struggled inside him.

st: Pelo ea Winston e ile ea hlohlelletsa. E ne e le bulletin ho tloha ka pele; Ke ne ke sa tsebe hore na ke litaba tse mpe tse tlang ho tla. Letsatsi lohle, ka maikutlo a fokolang a thabo, mohopolo oa ho hlÅloa o tÅ¡abehang Afrika o ne o le teng le kelellong ea hae. O ne a bonahala e le hantle ho bona lebotho la Eurasia le ntse le potoloha moeling o ke keng oa robeha le ho oela ntlheng ea Afrika joalo ka kholomo ea ants. Ke hobane'ng ha ho ne ho sa khonehe ho li tlosa ka tsela e itseng? SetÅ¡oantÅ¡o sa lebopo la Afrika Bophirima se ne se hlakile kelellong ea hae. O ile a nka pere e tÅ¡oeu 'me a e tsamaisa ka mose ho boto. Ho ne ho e-na le sebaka se nepahetseng. Le ha a ntse a bona horde e ntÅ¡o e rebeloa boroa o ile a bona matla a mang, a bokane ka mokhoa o makatsang, ka tÅ¡ohanyetso a lema ka morao, a khaola lipuisano tsa bona ka mobu le leoatle. O ile a nahana hore ka ho rata, o ne a tlisa matla ao a mang a neng a le teng. Leha ho le joalo, ho ne ho hlokahala hore u nke bohato ka potlako. Haeba ba ne ba ka fumana taolo ya Afrika kaofela, haeba ba ne ba na le lifofane le metheo ya submarine ho Kapa, e ne e tla khaola Oceania ka bobeli. E kanna ea bolela eng kapa eng: ho hloloa, ho senyeha, ho senyeha ha lefats'e, ho senyeha ha Mokha! O ile a phefumoloho e tebileng. tn: Pelo ya ga Winston e ne ya fuduega. E ne e le tsela e e tswang kwa pele; O ne a mmolelela gore dikgang tse di utlwisang botlhoko di ne tsa tla. Letsatsi lengwe le lengwe, go ne go na le dikakanyÃ´ tse di botlhoko tse di neng di le teng, go ne go na le sengwe se se neng se le teng mo Aforika borwa le mo mogopolong wa gagwe. O ne a lebega a bona masole a Eurasia a ntse a dikologa mo melelwaneng e e sa robegileng mme a tsena mo ntlheng ya Aforika jaaka kgolo ya ditshwene. Ke eng fa go ne go sa kgonege gore o se ka wa kgona go ba leleka ka tsela nngwe? Go ne ga bonala sentle gore kwa lobopong lwa Afrika Bophirima lo ne lo bonala sentle. O ne a tsaya pitse e tshweu a bo a e fudusa mo go yone. Go ne go na le lefelo le le tshwanetseng. Le fa a ne a bona batho ba basweu ba le mo borwa, o ne a bona mophato o mongwe o o neng o le mo sephiring, o ne wa bo o lemilwe ka ponyo ya leitlho, o ne wa dira ditlhaeletsano tsa bone mo lefatsheng le mo lewatleng. O ne a akanya gore ka go rata, o ne a dira gore go nne le maatla a mangwe. Re ne ra tshwanelwa ke go dira ka bonako. Fa ba ne ba ka kgona go laola Aforika yotlhe, fa ba ne ba na le di-airfields le metheo ya submarine kwa Kapa, e ne e tla kgaola Oceania ka bobedi. E ka tswa e kaya sengwe le sengwe: go senya, go senya, go senngwa ga lefatshe, go senngwa ga batho! O ne a hemela kwa godimo. 11Le fa go ntse jalo, go ne go se na le maikutlo a a sa tlwaelegang, mme e ne e se ka fa moseding; Go na le moo, go ne go se na ope yo o neng a kgona go bua gore ke mang yo o neng a sa kgone go bua gore ke mang yo o neng a sa kgone go itewa ke ope yo o neng a le mo go ene.

mg: Nidobodoboka ny fon'i Winston. Izany no biletÃ  avy any aloha; Nilaza taminy i Instinct fa vaovao ratsy no ho avy. Nandritra ny tontolo andro, niaraka tamin'ny fientanentanana kely, dia tao an-tsainy sy tsy tao an-tsainy ny eritreritra ny faharesena goavana tao Afrika. Raha ny marina dia toa nahita ny tafika Eoraziana nirohotra namakivaky ny sisintany tsy tapaka mihitsy izy ary niraraka tany amin'ny tendron'i Afrika toy ny andian-tsetroka. Nahoana no tsy azo natao ny nanala azy ireo tamin'ny fomba hafa? Nisongadina tao an-tsainy ny endriky ny morontsiraka andrefan'i Afrika. Noraisiny ilay akanjo fotsy ary natsipiny teo amin'ny solaitrabe. Nisy ny toerana tsara. Na dia nahita ilay hazakazaka mainty hoditra tany atsimo aza izy dia nahita hery iray hafa, izay niangona tamin'ny fomba hafahafa, nambolena tampoka tao aoriana, nanapaka ny fifandraisan'izy ireo tamin'ny alalan'ny tany sy ny ranomasina. Nihevitra izy fa tamin'ny alalan'ny fahavononany hanao izany dia nitondra izany hery hafa izany izy. Na izany aza, dia ilaina ny manao zavatra haingana. Raha afaka mifehy an'i Afrika manontolo izy ireo, raha manana seranam-piaramanidina sy toby ambanin'ny ranomasina ao Cape, dia mety hanapaka an'i Oseania ho roa izany. Mety hidika na inona na inona izany: faharesena, faharavana, fizarazarana indray izao tontolo izao, ny fandravana ny antoko! Nanao fofonaina lalina izy. Fifangaroan'ny fihetseham-po tsy manam-paharoaâ€”saingy tsy dia natambatra izany, raha ny marina; Fa kosa nisy ny fihetseham-po nifandimby, izay tsy nahafahana nilaza hoe iza amin'ireo sosona ambany indrindraâ€”no sahirana tao anatiny.

en: The telescreen was silent for a moment. Winston raised his head again. The bulletin! But no, they were merely changing the music. He had the map of Africa behind his eyelids. The movement of the armies was a diagram: a black arrow tearing vertically southward, and a white arrow tearing horizontally eastward, across the tail of the first. As though for reassurance he looked up at the imperturbable face in the portrait. Was it conceivable that the second arrow did not even exist?

en: It must have been about a month before she disappeared. It was a moment of reconciliation, when the nagging hunger in his belly was forgotten and his earlier affection for her had temporarily revived. He remembered the day well, a pelting, drenching day when the water streamed down the window pane and the light indoors was too dull to read by. The boredom of the two children in the dark, cramped bedroom became unbearable. Winston whined and grizzled, made futile demands for food, fretted about the room, pulling everything out of place and kicking the wainscoting until the neighbors banged on the wall, while the younger child wailed intermittently. In the end his mother said, â€œNow be good, and Iâ€™ll buy you a toy. A lovely toyâ€”youâ€™ll love itâ€; and then she had gone out in the rain, to a little general shop which was still sporadically open near by, and come back with a cardboard box containing an outfit of Snakes and Ladders. He could still remember the smell of the damp cardboard. It was a miserable outfit. The board was cracked and the tiny wooden dice were so ill-cut that they would hardly lie on their sides. Winston looked at the thing sulkily and without interest. But then his mother lit a piece of candle and they sat down on the floor to play. Soon he was wildly excited and shouting with laughter as the tiddlywinks climbed hopefully up the ladders and then came slithering down the snakes again, almost back to the starting point. They played eight games, winning four each. His tiny sister, too young to understand what the game was about, had sat propped up against a bolster, laughing because the others were laughing. For a whole afternoon they had all been happy together, as in his earlier childhood.

Era muy modesto. El cartÃ³n estaba rasgado y los pequeÃ±os dados de madera, tan mal cortados que apenas se sostenÃ­an. Winston recordaba el olor a humedad del cartÃ³n. st: E tlameha ebe e ne e le khoeli pele e nyamela. E ne e le nako ea poelano, ha tlala e tsoang mpeng ea hae e ne e lebetsoe mme lerato la hae la pejana ho eena le ile la mo tsosa ka nakoana. O ile a hopola letsatsi hantle, pelting, letsatsi la ho kolobisoa ha metsi a ntse a theoha ka fensetere 'me leseli le ka hare le ne le le lerootho haholo hore le bale. Ho teneha ha bana ba babeli ba lefifing, kamore e patisaneng e ile ea se ke ea e-ba e sa tloaelehang. Winston o ile a tlala le ho khathatseha, a etsa tlhokeho ea lefeela ea lijo, a khathatseha ka phapusing, a hula ntho e 'ngoe le e' ngoe sebakeng mme a raha wainscoting ho fihlela baahelani ba bang leboteng, ha ngoana e monyenyane a ntse a hakolla khafetsa. 'MÃ¨ oa hae o ile a re ho eena: "Joale e-ba hantle, 'me ke tla u reka toy. Ho ho ho, nice toy, i'll love it.; Eaba o tsoa puleng, lebenkeleng le lenyane le akaretsang le neng le ntse le bulehile ka mokhoa o makatsang, 'me a khutlela ka lebokoseng la karete e nang le seaparo sa Linoha le Litepisi. O ne a ntse a ka hopola monko oa khateboto e mongobo. E ne e le seaparo se sa tloaelehang. Ho ne ho le thata haholo, 'me li-cuttings tse nyenyane li ne li kula hoo li neng li sa khone ho robala ka mahlakoreng a tsona. Winston o ile a sheba ntho eo ka sulkily le ntle le thahasello. Joale 'mÃ¨ oa hae o ile a khabisa sekotoana sa likerese' me ba lula fatÅ¡e ho ea bapala. Haufinyane o ne a thabile haholo mme a hooa ka litÅ¡eho ha li-tiddlywink li nyoloha ka ts'epo ho fihlela litepisi ebe oa theoha linoha hape, hoo e batlang e khutlela sebakeng sa ho qala. Ba bapala lipapali tse 8, 'me ba hlÅla 4 ka ' ngoe. Khaitseli ea hae e monyane haholo ho utloisisa hore na papali eo e bua ka eng, o ne a lutse khahlanong le bolster, a tÅ¡eha hobane ba bang ba ne ba tÅ¡eha. Bakeng sa thapama eohle ba ne ba thabile hammoho, joalo ka bongoaneng ba hae.

tn: E tshwanetse ya bo e le kgwedi pele a nyelela. E ne e le nako ya poelano, fa tlala e e neng e le mo mpeng ya gagwe e ne e sa lebale mme lorato lwa gagwe la pele le ne le mo tsosa ka nakwana. O ne a gakologelwa letsatsi le le monate, letsatsi le le tlhabang, le le neng le le metsi a ne a tÅ¡habile mo lebating mme lesedi le ne le le mo ntlong ya gagwe le le le kwa tlase thata gore le ka buisa. Go ne ga nna le bana ba babedi ba ba neng ba le mo lefifing, ba ba neng ba le mo lefifing, ba ne ba se na sepe. Winston o ne a tshwentswe e bile a tshwentswe ke tlala, a kopa dijo, a kgaratlhela sengwe le sengwe go tswa mo lefelong a bo a raga go fitlhelela baagisani ba ntse ba le mo loboteng, fa ngwana yo mmotlana a ne a falafala gangwe le gape. Ka nako eo mmaagwe o ne a mo raya a re: "A ko o nne montle, mme ke tla go rÃªka toy." "A sweet toy, ya gonna love it" Morago ga moo, o ne a ya kwa lebenkeleng le lennye le le neng le sa ntse le bulega thata, mme a boa a na le lebokoso le le nang le lesipa la Dinoga le Lere. Le fa go ntse jalo, o ne a ka nna a gakologelwa monkgo wa seilwana sa gagwe se se neng se le mo go one. Go ne go na le se se bosula. Ba ne ba tlhwatlwa mme ba ne ba sa itse gore ba ka se ka ba tlhola ba le mo letlhakoreng la bone. Mme Winston o ne a leba dilo tse di neng di le gaufi e bile ga a na kgatlhego. Morago ga moo mmaagwe o ne a bona sengwe se se tshamekileng mme ba nna fa fatshe go ya go tshameka. Ka bonako fela o ne a itumetse thata mme a goa ka setshego fa di-tiddlywink di ntse di tlhatloga ka tsholofelo ya go tsholetsa dithibela mme morago ga moo go ne ga tla go kokoanya dinoga gape, di batlile di boela kwa tshimologong. O ne a tshameka metshameko e le robedi mme a fenya di le nne. Le fa go ntse jalo, mmaagwe O ne a le monnye thata gore a tlhaloganye gore motshameko wa gagwe o ne o ntse jang, o ne o eme fa fatshe, o ne a tshega ka ntlha ya gore ba bangwe ba ne ba tshega. Mo maitseboeng otlhe ba ne ba itumetse mmogo, fela jaaka fa a ne a le mo dingwageng tse di fetileng.

Ua haamana'o maitai oia i taua mahana ra, te hoÃª mahana tapo'ipo'i e te apoopoo, a tahe mai ai te pape na roto i te haamaramarama e e mea haumani roa te maramarama i roto i te mau fare no te tai'o. mg: Tsy maintsy ho iray volana teo ho eo talohan'ny nanjavonany. Fotoana iray nampihavanana izany, rehefa adino ny hanoanana tao an-kibony ary niverina vetivety ny fitiavany azy teo aloha. Tsaroany tsara ilay andro, andro iray nihohoka sy nangovitra rehefa nidina teo amin'ny lapoaly ny rano ary ny hazavana tao an-trano dia tsy afaka novakina. Lasa tsy zaka ny fahasorenan'ireo ankizy roa tao amin'ny efitrano fandriana maizina sy tery. Nitaraina sy nisafoaka i Winston, nanao fangatahana tsy misy dikany ho an'ny sakafo, nisafoaka momba ny efitrano, nisintona ny zava-drehetra hiala teo amin'ny toerana ary nandaka ny wainscoting mandra-pandrÃ ran'ireo mpifanolo-bodirindrina ny rindrina, raha toa kosa ilay zaza kely ka nikiakiaka tsindraindray. Hoy ny reniny tamin'ny farany: "Aoka ho tsara izao, fa hividy kilalao ho anao aho. Kilalao mahafinaritra - ho tianao izany"; ary avy eo dia nivoaka tao anatin'ny orana izy, tany amin'ny toeram-pivarotana kely iray izay mbola nisokatra tsindraindray teo akaikiny, ary niverina niaraka tamin'ny baoritra misy akanjon'ny bibilava sy ny tohatra. Mbola tsaroany ny fofon'ny baoritra mando. Fitafiana fadiranovana izany. Vaky ny solaitrabe ary tena ratsy ny hazo kely ka zara raha nandry teo amin'ny andaniny sy ny ankilany izy ireo. Winston dia nijery ny zavatra tsy misy dikany sy tsy misy fahalianana. Saingy avy eo dia nandrehitra labozia iray ny reniny ary nipetraka teo amin'ny tany izy ireo mba hilalao. Tsy ela dia nientanentana be izy ary nikiakiaka tamim-pihomehezana rehefa nihanika ny tohatra ireo ' tiddlywinks' ary avy eo dia tonga nidina indray ireo bibilava, saika niverina tany amin'ny toerana voalohany. Nanao lalao valo izy ireo, nandresy efatra avy. Ny anabaviny kely, izay mbola kely loatra ka tsy mahatakatra ny momba ilay lalao, dia nipetraka nanohitra ny fanamafisana, nihomehy satria nihomehy ireo hafa. Nandritra ny tolakandro iray manontolo dia samy faly avokoa izy rehetra, toy ny tamin'ny fahazazany teo aloha.

en: The voice from the telescreen was still pouring forth its tale of prisoners and booty and slaughter, but the shouting outside had died down a little. The waiters were turning back to their work. One of them approached with the gin bottle. Winston, sitting in a blissful dream, paid no attention as his glass was filled up. He was not running or cheering any longer. He was back in the Ministry of Love, with everything forgiven, his soul white as snow. He was in the public dock, confessing everything, implicating everybody. He was walking down the white-tiled corridor, with the feeling of walking in sunlight, and an armed guard at his back. The long-hoped-for bullet was entering his brain.

Uno de ellos acercÃ³ la botella de ginebra. Winston, sumergido en su feliz ensueÃ±o, no prestÃ³ atenciÃ³n mientras le llenaban el vaso. Ya no se veÃ­a corriendo ni gritando, sino de regreso al Ministerio del Amor, con todo olvidado, con el alma blanca como la nieve. Estaba confesÃ¡ndolo todo en un proceso pÃºblico, comprometiendo a todos. Marchaba por un claro pasillo con la sensaciÃ³n de andar al sol y un guardia armado lo seguÃ­a. La bala tan esperada penetraba por fin en su cerebro.

tn: Lentswe le le tswang mo thelefong le ne le sa ntse le tsholola mafoko a bagolegwa le go tlhaba, mme go goa kwa ntle go ne go tlhokafetse go se kae. Ba ba neng ba letile go boela kwa ditirong tsa bone. Nngwe ya tsone e ne e atamela ka lentlolo la galase. Mo godimo ga moo, O ne a ntse a le mo torong e e tseneletseng, a se ka a nna kelotlhoko fa a ne a le kwa godimo. O ne a sa tlhole a tsamaya kgotsa a taboga. O ne a le mo bodireding jwa lorato, ka sengwe le sengwe se se itshwaretsweng, moya wa gagwe o mosweu jaaka lepoko. O ne a le mo maemong a a kwa pele, a ipolela sengwe le sengwe, a tshamekgisa mongwe le mongwe. O ne a tsamaya ka tsela e tshweu, ka maikutlo a go tsamaya mo letsatsing, le motlhokomedi wa dibetsa fa morago ga gagwe. 'The long-hope for the bullet was entered his brain' - Seitlhamo se ne se tsena mo bokong jwa gagwÃª

mg: Mbola namoaka ny tantarany momba ireo gadra sy ny babo ary ny famonoana ny feo avy amin'ny tele, saingy maty kely ny hiaka tany ivelany. Nihemotra tamin'ny asany ireo mpivarotra. Ny iray tamin'izy ireo dia nanatona niaraka tamin'ny tavoahangy gin. Winston, nipetraka tao anatin'ny nofy feno fahasambarana, dia tsy niraharaha rehefa feno ny verany. Tsy nihazakazaka na nifaly intsony izy. Niverina tao amin'ny Minisiteran'ny Fitiavana izy, niaraka tamin'ny famelan-keloka ny zavatra rehetra, fotsy tahaka ny oram-panala ny fanahiny. Tao amin'ny lapan'ny daholobe izy, niaiky ny zava-drehetra, nandray anjara tamin'ny rehetra. Nandeha teny amin'ny lalantsara fotsy izy, niaraka tamin'ny fahatsapana ho mandeha amin'ny hazavan'ny masoandro, ary mpiambina mitam-piadiana eo an-damosiny. Niditra tao amin'ny atidohany ilay bala efa nandrasana hatry ny ela.
